mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_admin(adminId, pwd, adminName, adminEmail, adminMobile, adminDept, auth, ip, deleteYn) VALUES (#{adminId}, SHA2(#{pwd}, 256), #{adminName}, #{adminEmail}, #{adminMobile}, #{adminDept}, #{auth}, #{ip}, #{deleteYn})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_admin SET adminId=#{adminId}, pwd=SHA2(#{pwd}, 256), adminName=#{adminName}, adminEmail=#{adminEmail}, adminMobile=#{adminMobile}, adminDept=#{adminDept}, auth=#{auth}, ip=#{ip}, deleteYn=#{deleteYn} WHERE seq = #{seq}

/** ManageMapper.admin_menu_bottom_list */ WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT seq, a.groupNm, codeNm, parent, title, keyword, targetType, level, sort FROM menu a WHERE parent = #{parent} UNION ALL SELECT t.seq, t.groupNm, t.codeNm, t.parent, t.title, t.keyword, t.targetType, t.level, t.sort FROM menu t JOIN cte h ON t.parent = h.seq ) SELECT * FROM cte
